ArgonTest.Name: Int comparison operators
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Argon.Core/*
proc main(): () do puts ((99 = 2).to_s()) puts ((99 = 99).to_s()) puts ((99 != 2).to_s()) puts ((99 != 99).to_s()) puts ((99 < 2).to_s()) puts ((99 < 99).to_s()) puts ((99 <= 2).to_s()) puts ((99 <= 99).to_s()) puts ((99 > 2).to_s()) puts ((99 > 99).to_s()) puts ((99 >= 2).to_s()) puts ((99 >= 99).to_s()) end
ArgonTest.ExpectedOutput: false true true false false false false true true false true true
